Venny

Korean: 베니

Country:

South Korea

Jang Hye-won

24 years old

Group (2022-present):
Kandis

Introduction

Venny is a South Korean singer under SXTYDGRS. She is a member of the girl group Kandis which she was added to on October 10, 2023.

Venny was a former pre-debut member of the girl group FANATICS under FENT using her birth name Hyewon.
